text: Indecent Proposal is a 1988 novel by Jack Engelhard. ==Personal life== In 1993 it was adapted into a film of the same name by director Adrian Lyne. A musical version by Dylan Schlosberg and Michael Conley is scheduled to open at London's Southwark Playhouse.https://www.whatsonstage.com/london- theatre/news/indecent-proposal-musical-southwark-playhouse_50863.html ==References== Category:1988 novels
title: Indecent Proposal (novel)
